price: Àwọn tó pe Tírà náà àti ohun tí A fi rán àwọn Òjíṣẹ́ Wa níṣẹ́ ní irọ́, láìpẹ́ wọ́n máa mọ̀.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَبِمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا بِهِۦ رُسُلَنَاۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
